text: Vanu anevo nni avala vakálihakajangije muchi chivalihakajanga vanu valâla ugoni, henga váhwenehije chihi kukulupika muchi chivakulupika vanu vakámmaite nnume au mmahe, kwa kunnondola Mwana wanga Ungandolo kila pachinu páchivalòjà. Vanu anevo vánikombolwa kuhaloka muvanu vanji uchinga vààve vatandi kuhumywa kwanga Nnungu na kwa Mwana wanga Ungandolo malinga sadaka ya mavuno matandi.
